title: Four hurt in overnight Little Rock shooting
content:
LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (KTHV) -- Four people were hurt after a shooting just west of I-30 on Wednesday night.
The shooting occurred in the area of 21st and Bragg Streets around 11 p.m. According to police, one of the injured is in serious condition.
Little Rock police say they don't have any information on a suspect at this time. No other information has been released.
Stay with THV11 and thv11.com for updates as they become available.
